summary: Users encountered TypeError when using console.warn() in workflows. Request to add missing console methods (warn, error, info, debug) to the workflow VM, which currently only supports console.log().
userImpact: Users cannot use standard console methods beyond console.log() within workflows, forcing workarounds or incomplete logging capabilities.
rootCause: The workflow VM sandbox only exposes console.log() function, missing other standard console methods.
proposedFix: Add console.warn(), console.error(), console.info(), and console.debug() functions to the workflow VM environment alongside the existing console.log().
resolutionDetails: The missing console methods were added to the workflow VM.
